meanings.definition: To clothe or adorn oneself again.
meanings.sent1: After swimming, she revests in her warm clothes.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he revests in his favorite outfit.
meanings.sent3: The superhero revests in their costume before fighting crime.
meanings.sent4: The tree revests in vibrant colors in the fall.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar revests in a beautiful butterfly.

meanings.definition: To invest again with a title or office.
meanings.sent1: The king revests his loyal advisor with the title of knight.
meanings.sent2: The company revests the retiring CEO with an honorary position.
meanings.sent3: The magician revests the rabbit with the title of 'Master of Disappearing Acts'.
meanings.sent4: The teacher revests the student with the title of 'Classroom Helper'.
meanings.sent5: The mayor revests the citizen with the title of 'Honorary Citizen of the Year'.
